about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Professional Auto Detailing Excellence
about.description: Down2Detail is Montreal's premier auto detailing service, dedicated to providing exceptional care for your vehicle.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: What drives us every day
values.qualityDescription: We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional results using premium products and proven techniques. Every detail matters in our pursuit of perfection.
values.genuineDescription: We listen first. By understanding your needs and expectations, we deliver tailored detailing solutions with full transparency and honest guidance.
values.timelyDescription: Your time matters. We pride ourselves on efficient scheduling, clear communication, and delivering pristine results — always on time, never rushed.
values.attentionDescription: No smudge, swirl, or stain goes unnoticed. We go the extra mile to deliver a flawless finish — because every detail matters.
values.reliableDescription: Whether it's your first visit or your tenth, our process and results stay consistent. We're all about dependable service that earns long-term trust.
values.professionalDescription: We operate with respect, integrity, and full accountability — showing up prepared, delivering as promised, and holding ourselves to the highest standards.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the highest quality auto detailing services in Montreal while building lasting relationships with our clients through exceptional service and attention to detail.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our experienced professionals are passionate about automotive care and committed to delivering results that exceed your expectations.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Passion-Driven Detailing Excellence
story.description1: Down2Detail was founded with a clear mission: to elevate vehicle detailing to a whole new level in Montreal. What began as a one-man operation in a small garage has grown into a trusted brand, known for precision, passion, and perfection.
story.description2: Over the years, our team has had the privilege of working with high-profile clients and prestigious vehicles, including detailing for luxury brands like Ferrari, Lamborghini, Rolls-Royce, Porsche, and more. These collaborations pushed us to refine our techniques and raise our standards continuously.
story.description3: Today, Down2Detail stands as a symbol of trust and quality. Whether it's ceramic coating a supercar or deep-cleaning a daily driver, we treat every vehicle with the same level of care and dedication. Your car deserves nothing less than perfection — and that's what we deliver.

approach.title: Our Process
approach.subtitle: The Down2Detail Difference
approach.description: At Down2Detail, it's not just about cleaning cars, it's about delivering a meticulous, high-end experience that protects and elevates your vehicle. Our refined process ensures your car looks and feels its absolute best, every time.
approach.step1Description: We perform a full assessment of your vehicle's condition — identifying paint defects, interior wear, and contamination levels before recommending the ideal service.
approach.step2Description: Using industry-grade tools and products, we perform high-pressure washes, foam treatments, decontamination, and stain extractions inside and out.
approach.step3Description: We eliminate swirl marks, scratches, and oxidation through multi-stage polishing, restoring depth, clarity, and gloss to your vehicle's finish.
approach.step4Description: We apply high-performance sealants or ceramic coatings to lock in the shine, protect the paint, and ensure long-term durability.
approach.step5Description: Every vehicle goes through a final inspection and touch-up before we return it to you — looking brand new and ready to turn heads.
